name: Guardian Popon FREE
description:
This application is a trial version!

You can try the game playing the Episode 0.

----------------------------------------

Marines are attacking a new-build house!!

Popon has built a fancy carrot house in a restricted area without permission. Soon after, the marines found it out and gave him an eviction order because the house will be destroyed.

Popon is not willing to leave and he is determined to oppose the marines but having no weapon...
he has no option but to sacrifice his valuable household goods!!

In order to protect his new-build carrot house
let's throw slippers, chairs, plants, TV and different household items to the enemy.

New throw-able items will be available as we advance in the game.
